attributes.action: Cyclists - Stop at the red light
attributes.additional_details:
Cyclists put the lives of pedestrians, car drivers and themselves at risk every day by breaking red traffic lights on the road.

More severe penalties need to be put in place to prevent cyclists from doing this to ensure that accidents and aggressive confrontations between pedestrains, car drivers and the cyclists in question are reduced. It is about time that cyclists took responsibility for their actions and obeyed the rules of the road, with consequences put in place.
